title: Spacious Corner 1 BD/1BA At The Artani w/ W&D, Balcony, Parking
posting_body: ['818 Van Ness Avenue #502 - Spacious 1 Bedroom At The Artani', 'NOTE- NO VIRTUAL SHOWINGS.', 'ANYONE INTERESTED MUST BE PHYSICALLY PRESENT FOR IN-PERSON VIEWINGS.', 'THANK YOU!', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Spacious 1 bed/1 bath at The Artani, a 52 unit condominium building built in 2008', 'Fifth floor corner unit with open floor plan', 'Beech hardwood floors in all common areas.', 'Italian ceramic tile in the bathrooms & upgraded berber carpet in the bedroom', 'Bedroom features walk-in closet', 'Kitchen has ceaserstone counters, solid oak cabinets and includes a Boshe refrigerator, dishwasher & gas range', 'Overhead lighting throughout.', 'Track lighting on dimmers.', 'In-unit washer & dryer', 'Building features beautifully landscaped roof deck, designer lobby, and', 'two high speed elevators', 'LOCATION:', 'Walk score of 99 – “Walker’s Paradise” and Transit Score of 94 “Rider’s Paradise” – 3 minute commute to downtown SF; multiple muni lines nearby on Van Ness (5,7,47,49); 10 minute walk to Civic Center Bart!', 'Live in the center of the San Francisco arts and culture hub that includes the Opera, Symphony, Ballet, Jazz Center, Public Library and Asian Arts Museum that are just blocks away', 'Ten minute walk to Prime Hayes Valley with tons of unique retail stores, restaurants, cafes, and bars', 'Five minute drive to freeway onramp to the 101/280 and Bay Bridge.', 'OTHER DETAILS:', 'No smoking', 'Owner pays for trash service – tenant responsible for water, gas, and electricity', 'Sorry, no pets', 'Minimum lease term is 12 months', 'Minimum credit score of 700 and combined monthly gross income of 3x rent required', 'Deposit is 1.5x monthly rent', 'For more information', 'Contact Lisa at', 'show contact info', 'Compass', 'Lic#02094548', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'Square footage is approximate.']
